name: cookingTimer_decrease
description: This function is used to decrease the cooking time of a cooker by a specified duration.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking time is being decreased.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking time is being decreased.

parameters.name: cookingTimer
parameters.description: The additional duration to be subtracted from the existing cooking time.
